1.author: Amelia Tait
1.title: The Psychological Impact of Consuming True Crime
1.description: From 'Serial' to Netflix's Jeffrey Dahmer series, it's time to think about what pop culture's fascination with murder cases does to viewers—and victims.

2.title: Are You a Victim of Crypto Crime? Good Luck Getting Help
2.description: Local law enforcement isn't ready to deal with this new type of fraud, even with shady scams on the rise.

3.title: An Uber Eats Delivery Robot Crashed a Crime Scene
